meanings.definition: A subdivision of a district in India.
meanings.sent1: In India, the local government oversees various taluks within a district.
meanings.sent2: The taluks in the district each have their own unique characteristics.
meanings.sent3: The taluks decided to have a friendly competition to see who could grow the biggest pumpkin.
meanings.sent4: The taluks stood out like colorful puzzle pieces in the vast district landscape.
meanings.sent5: The bustling markets in the taluks were a vibrant hub of activity.

meanings.definition: The plural form of 'taluk', referring to multiple subdivisions of a district in India.
meanings.sent1: Traveling through the countryside, we passed by several taluks on our way to the city.
meanings.sent2: The map displayed all the taluks that made up the district.
meanings.sent3: The children in the taluks formed a band and surprised everyone with a concert.
meanings.sent4: From above, the taluks looked like tiny dots on a colorful canvas.
meanings.sent5: The diversity of cultures in the taluks was truly fascinating.
